name: PAT_ENC_MSP_EMPLR
description: This table contains the Employer Information part of the Medicare Secondary Payor Information from the Patient (EPT) master file.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date (calendar format) on which the encounter took place.

columns.name: PAT_EMPLYD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is currently employed for the purposes of the MSPQ. Y indicates that the patient is currently employed. N indicates that the patient is not currently employed or has never been employed. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.
entries: Yes, but Retired from Previous Employment

columns.name: EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: Name of the patient's employer.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_SIZE_C_NAME
columns.description: The size range category ID of the patient's employer.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_PHONE
columns.description: Phone number of the patient's employer.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_ADR_1
columns.description: Line 1 of the patient's employer's address.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_ADR_2
columns.description: Line 2 of the patient's employer's address.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_CITY
columns.description: City of the patient's employer.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_ZIP
columns.description: Zip code of the patient's employer.

columns.name: OTHER_EMPLYD_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the spouse or other family member is currently employed for the purposes of the MSPQ. Y indicates that the spouse or other family member is currently employed. N indicates that the spouse or other family member is not currently employed or has never been employed. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.
entries: Yes, but Retired from Previous Employment

columns.name: OTHR_FAM_MEM_NAME
columns.description: Name of other family members who are employed.

columns.name: OTHR_FAM_REL_C_NAME
columns.description: Employed family member's relationship to the patient.

columns.name: OTHR_EMPLR_NAME
columns.description: Employed family member employer's name.

columns.name: OTHR_EMPLR_SIZE_C_NAME
columns.description: Size of the employer of the other employed family member.

columns.name: OTHR_EMPLR_PHONE
columns.description: Phone number of the employer of the other employed family member.

columns.name: OTHR_EMPLR_ADR_1
columns.description: Line 1 of the employer's address of the other employed family member.

columns.name: OTHR_EMPLR_ADR_2
columns.description: Line 2 of the employer's address of the other employed family member.

columns.name: OTHR_EMPLR_CITY
columns.description: City of the employer of the other employed family member.

columns.name: OTHR_EMPLR_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: State of the employer of the other employed family member.

columns.name: OTHR_EMPLR_ZIP
columns.description: Zip of the employer of the other employed family member.

columns.name: FAMILY_EMPLR_NAME
columns.description: Name of the family member's employer. In some questionnaires, this information is instead stored as part of the spouse / other family member employer information, OTHR_EMPLR_*.

columns.name: FAMILY_EMPLR_ADR_1
columns.description: First line of the family member's employer's address. In some questionnaires, this information is instead stored as part of the spouse / other family member employer information, OTHR_EMPLR_*.

columns.name: FAMILY_EMPLR_ADR_2
columns.description: Second line of the family member's employer's address. In some questionnaires, this information is instead stored as part of the spouse / other family member employer information, OTHR_EMPLR_*.

columns.name: FAMILY_EMPLR_CITY
columns.description: The City part of the family member's employer's address.

columns.name: FAMILY_EMPLR_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP part of the family member's employer's address.

columns.name: FAMILY_EMPLR_PHONE
columns.description: Family member's employer's phone number. In some questionnaires, this information is instead stored as part of the spouse / other family member employer information, OTHR_EMPLR_*.
